quote: A wise man ought always to follow the paths beaten by great men, and to imitate those who have been supreme, so that if his ability does not equal theirs, at least it will savour of it.
quote_letters: A WISE MAN OUGHT ALWAYS TO FOLLOW THE PATHS BEATEN BY GREAT MEN AND TO IMITATE THOSE WHO HAVE BEEN SUPREME SO THAT IF HIS ABILITY DOES NOT EQUAL THEIRS AT LEAST IT WILL SAVOUR OF IT
